{{Server client function}}

This function returns the alpha (transparency) value for the specified [[/element.md|element]]. This can be a [[/player.md|player]], [[/ped.md|ped]], [[/object.md|object]], [[/vehicle.md|vehicle]] or [[/Element/Weapon.md|weapon]].

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
int getElementAlpha ( element theElement )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/element.md|element]]:getAlpha|alpha|setElementAlpha}}

===Required Arguments===
*'''theElement:''' The [[/element.md|element]] whose alpha you want to retrieve.

===Returns===
Returns an integer (0-255; 0 = transparent) indicating the element's alpha, or ''false'' if invalid arguments were passed.

==Example==
<section name="Clientside example" class="client" show="true">
This example outputs whether the player is invisible.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function amIVisible()
	if getElementAlpha(localPlayer) == 0 then
            outputChatBox("I'm invisible")
        else
            outputChatBox("I'm not invisible")
        end
end
addCommandHandler ( "amivisible", amIVisible )
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
